thread.title: Manchester United and Bayern Munich youth academies will compete in the Youdan Trophy for the first time this summer
thread.title_full: Manchester United and Bayern Munich youth academies will compete in the Youdan Trophy for the first time this summer

author: ituckey
title: Manchester United and Bayern Munich youth academies will compete in the Youdan Trophy for the first time this summer
text:
Comments MANCHESTER UNITED and Bayern Munich will compete in the Youdan Trophy for the first time this summer. 
The 150th anniversary of the original youth tournament will take place in Sheffield from the end of July. PA:Press Association Nicky But is in charge of the Old Trafford academy – from where he graduated and became both a Manchester United and England midfielder 
And United , with former Red Devils midfielder Nicky Butt heading their academy, will send an Under-14 team. 
Other teams will include FC Basel, Everton and Celtic , with Hoops superkid Karamoko Dembele being named ‘Player of the Tournament’ in the past two seasons. Getty Images Celtic whizkid Karamoko Dembele has been named the best player in the Sheffield tournament for two seasons in a row Getty Images Former Utd stars Nicky Butt, Ryan Giggs and Rio Ferdinand all progressed to Manchester United stardom via their famous youth system Getty Images Hoops winger Dembele has played for both England U-15s and Scotland U-16s RELATED STORIES No back-flaw Pep Guardiola defends his leaky defence after watching his 'perfect plan' blow up in his face in Monaco QUICK DRAW Leicester await quarter-final draw where they could meet Barcelona, Real Madrid or Bayern Munich Quarter rounders When is the Champions League quarter-final draw, how can I watch it and which teams are in it?
